lead_paragraph: Gordmans Stores, a Midwestern discount retailer,  is preparing an initial public offering this week and, reports The Wall Street Journal, investors are watching.

headline.main: Gordmans Discount Retail Stores to Go Public

abstract: Gordmans Stores, a Midwestern discount retailer is preparing an initial public offering this week and, reports The Wall Street Journal, investors are watching.
